Public Events.title: Ital_IA: tra dati pubblici e algoritmi (Milan)
Public Events.subtitle: Public Event
Public Events.description: Ital_IA is a conference held at the Politecnico di Milano and organized by Agenzia delle Dogane e dei Monopoli and Sogei S.p.A. exploring data valorization in public administration, focusing on advanced data processing methodologies and AI integration for enhanced government services. Panel title: 'Ricerca e innovazione nel dominio dei dati'.

Public Events.title: Fanpage.it Rumore Festival 2025 (Rome)
Public Events.subtitle: Public Event
Public Events.description: Rumore is the yearly Fanpage.it festival dedicated to fostering urgent and meaningful dialogue on contemporary issues. I spoke in a panel discussion on artificial intelligence alongside writer Chiara Valerio, moderated by journalist Elisabetta Rosso. The festival featured prominent figures including Roberto Saviano, Matteo Renzi, and Francesca Albanese across various thematic sessions.

Public Events.title: L'AI va a scuola
Public Events.subtitle: Seminar in Public Event
Public Events.description: 'L'AI va a scuola', organized by ANP (associazione nazionale dirigenti pubblici e alta professionalità della scuola), is a series of webinars for school leaders, teachers, students, and families. Seminar Title: '5 punti di partenza sui LLM'.

Public Events.title: Folle di Scienza (Strambino, Turin)
Public Events.subtitle: Seminar in Public Event
Public Events.description: Folle di Scienza is a three-day gathering in Strambino that brings together science communicators to co-design and envision the future of science communication, offering valuable opportunities to discuss, exchange ideas, and learn from others. Seminar title: 'AIAIAI: corso di primo soccorso per aspiranti smanettoni'.

Public Events.title: Antropochip (Bari)
Public Events.subtitle: Public Event
Public Events.description: Antropochip is a science communication initiative at Politecnico di Bari exploring the intersection of technology and human values through an innovative blend of coding and creative expression.

Public Events.title: Senti chi parla (Santena, Turin)
Public Events.subtitle: Public Event
Public Events.description: Senti chi parla is an initiative organized by the Biblioteca Civica Santena that aims to communicate current and relevant topics to the general public.

Public Events.title: Podcast UmAnI (Florence)
Public Events.subtitle: Recorded Event
Public Events.description: UmAnI is a podcast curated by the Department of Physics and Astronomy of the Università degli Studi di Firenze focused on the scientific dissemination for students.

Public Events.title: Filosofia versus Intelligenza Artificiale (Maiano Firenze)
Public Events.subtitle: Seminar in Public Event
Public Events.description: Filosofia versus Intelligenza Artificiale is an interdisciplinary conference that explores the intersection of artificial intelligence technology and philosophical inquiry, addressing both technical developments and ethical-humanitarian implications of AI advancement. Seminar title: '5 punti fermi sui Large Language Models'.

Public Events.title: GDPR Forum (Reggio Emilia)
Public Events.subtitle: Seminar in Public Event
Public Events.description: The GDPR Forum is a PrivacyLab-sponsored event bringing together sector stakeholders to establish best practices for balancing AI advancement with personal data protection regulations and ethical standards. Seminar title: 'ChatGPT è un cazzaro: 5 punti fermi sui Large Language Models'.

Public Events.title: Connessioni Invisibili - 8ª Giornata Nazionale Dipendenze Tecnologiche e Cyberbullismo (Siena)
Public Events.subtitle: Seminar in Public Event
Public Events.description: Connessioni Invisibili is a multidisciplinary event examining the impact of technology on young people's daily lives, featuring expert discussions on health, social development, digital literacy, and the relationship between technology and creativity. Seminar title: 'ChatGPT è un cazzaro: 5 punti fermi sui LLMs'.

Public Events.title: Poplar Cult Festival (Trento)
Public Events.subtitle: Seminar in Public Event
Public Events.description: The Poplar Cult Festival is a music and cultural event that combines live musical acts with cultural events and community programming to revitalize Trentino's artistic landscape and bridge contemporary creative expression with local heritage. Seminar title: 'ChatGPT è un cazzaro (in senso filosofico)'.
